    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()

      • register

        public void register()
        Method that will be called when the register button in the register view is clicked. It will performs checks to make sure all requirements are met before registering user.

        Requirements for a registration to succeed:
        • 1. All inputs are not empty
        • 2. Username and email is not already taken
        • 3. Passwords match

        Response from database trying to register user
        • 0 = user registered
        • 1= username taken
        • 2= email taken
        • 3 = username and email taken
        If the registration is successful, it will switch to the dashboard view

      • login

        public void login()
        Method that will be called when the login button in the register view is clicked. Will go back to the login view
